extendedInfo.description: Auto Call Answer is simple and easy to use application. It pickup/answer incoming call and play selected mp3 file to caller.1. Copy mp3 file in SDCard (Which you want to play as answer of incoming call).2. Click on "Auto Answer Audio File" button.3. Select mp3 file from SDCard.4. Click "Disable Auto Call Response" button, Its toggle button, It is used to enable/disable Auto Answer functionality5. Wait for phone call.6. Application will pickup/answer the call and play your favorite response to caller. (Make sure you set "Enable Auto Call Response")Enjoy.......Note: This application optimized for Samsung Nexus S.

reviews.title: Good aap
reviews.comment: Needs to improve a lot  Doesn\'t work on my galaxy grand GT - i19082  It should allow to manage list ie which #\" we want to avoid + calling party should hear only selected mp3 file not all backgroud noise
reviews.author: MUKESH GOSALIA

reviews.title: usefull tool
reviews.comment: Is a great app, just need some features like ring time\'s and ringer muteing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very good thinking
reviews.comment: Whoever has done this, they have read my mind. I wanted this application to let people hear that I am busy and can not take their call (not send an auto-reply SMS). Its fantastic thinking by the developer of this application. However, I suggest some improvements such as... 1. The person calling should not be hearing everything that is happening over with me. As of now, this app answers the caller, plays the mp3 file but also is open to the caller to listen what is going on around my place. This need to be controlled and improved. 2. It would be great if the caller can leave a voice mail that can be stored as a file on my phone, instead of calling the voice-mail service!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad
reviews.comment: Samsung galaxy s2  It just plays the recorded sound via speakerphone. If by anyway you can route the voice via mic it will make wonders ... Till then uninstall
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: No support for galaxy ace, though it receives the incoming call and plays the recorded message at my end only and not at the callers end !. So useless
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Working fine with my Samsung Galaxy Nexus
reviews.comment: I\'ve read all the comments and first I feel afraid to install this apps but then I think why not I give it a try. Then after I downloaded this apps and recorded my own voice, the apps is working great. I ask my friends to try make a call to me and they hear clearly my voice answering his call, saying: \"Sorry I cannot answer your call right now. Please call back me later\". Good job dev but i think you need to updates the apps.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good need to be improved
reviews.comment: This application is Good but need improvement. worked as below  1. installed successfully 2. Automatically received call 3. played selected music  problem  1. Caller unable to hear any thing. 2. caller can hear my voice  Suggestions  1.mute mic 2. mute speaker 3. selected audio must be transmitted to caller in place mice audio 4. timer for auto receive call (very helpful).  I am using mm a100.  Quicker response for reviews from developer is appreciated
reviews.author: Pradeep Kumarsk

reviews.title: Plays the song to me instead of my caller!!!!
reviews.comment: yeah .. this is wats happening when i put this app. Everytime someone calls me.. i get to hear the music!! :P
reviews.author: Sheetal Pandrekar

reviews.title: Good but need improvement
reviews.comment: Can\'t set time delay before picking call.otherwise good

reviews.title: Very cool
reviews.comment: Ten stars not five... I needed to call my gf while she was in an exam to help her... Thanks a lot...

reviews.title: Crap
reviews.comment: This app is crap, doesnt work, it plays the mp3 on my end(installer) not at the caller(receiver) end.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works, but not as expected.
reviews.comment: This app actually answers the call and places it on hands free. Then it plays the file out loud so the microphone picks it up.  Unfortunately, it also picks up any other sound in the room.  What I was looking for was for was an app that answered and replied silently.
reviews.author: Moe Haliska

reviews.title: karthikeyan R C
reviews.comment: There is some thing to improve. its not playing the audio file at the call end
reviews.author: Karthi Keyan

reviews.comment: it did answer the call and it did play a very distorted noise  needs a lot of improvement
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does its work partly
reviews.comment: The app receives the call but doesn\'t play the mp3 file and the call just continues.  What is needed :  1. Play recorded message without background noise. 2.Option to save message after the mp3 is played.
reviews.author: A Google User
